mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visit_log (user_id, attraction_no, entered_at, exited_at, preference) VALUES (#{userId}, #{attractionNo}, #{enteredAt}, #{exitedAt}, #{preference})
mapper.select: SELECT vl.id AS visitLogId, vl.attraction_no AS attractionNo, a.title, a.latitude, a.longitude, vl.entered_at AS enteredAt, vl.exited_at AS exitedAt, vl.preference FROM visit_log vl JOIN attractions a ON vl.attraction_no = a.no WHERE vl.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY vl.entered_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
